item.title: Markdown Syntax - Complete Tutorial
item.description: Complete Tutorial Of Markdown Syntax Markdown is a method of writting and representing data in a beautiful way. It's widely used for creating documentation, README files, Blogs, and other types of content on the web. In this tutorial, we'll cover the basic syntax of Markdown in simple words. 1. Headings To create headings, use hash symbols (#). Use hash as per your heading level. 1# Heading 1 2 3## Heading 2 4 5### Heading 3 6 7#### Heading 4 8 9##### Heading 5 10 11###### Heading 6 Output -

item.title: Hugo : World's Fastest Framework For Website Building ðŸ”¥
item.description: Hey GuysðŸ‘‹, Let's Learn Everything About Hugo: The World's fastest Framework For Website Development. What Is Hugo? Hugo is the world's fastest framework for website building. Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator. Hugo is based on the Go programming language. It supports multiple free hosting platforms like Github, Gitlab, Netlify, etc. Hugo provides us with various templates for web designing at zero cost. Hugo is one of the popular frameworks for building a website in a few minutes.
